# SCNShadowMode.deferred

**Case**

SceneKit renders shadows in a postprocessing pass.

## Declaration

```swift
case deferred
```

## Discussion

In the mode, SceneKit blends shadows into the final image after the main rendering pass, so shadows can be of any color.

## Constants

- **SCNShadowMode.forward**: SceneKit renders shadows during lighting computations.
- **SCNShadowMode.modulated**: SceneKit renders shadows by projecting the light’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/gobo] image. The light does not illuminate the scene.
